mods.abstract: Wrigley's 1948 Thanksgiving special, originally broadcast 1948-11-25 (part 5). Featuring Gene Autry (host, performer), Arthur Godfrey (host, performer), Lud Gluskin (conductor), Lou Crosby (announcer), Les Weinrott (producer), with performers the Andrews Sisters, Pat Buttram, members of the cast of My Friend Irma (Marie Wilson as Irma, Joan Banks as Jane, creator Cy Howard), Carmen Miranda, Abe Burrows, Dorothy Lamour, Amos 'n' Andy (Freeman Gosden and Charles Correll), Danny Kaye, Roddy McDowall, Abbott and Costello, Buddy Clark, Louella Parsons, Phil Gordon, and the Pinafores.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
